types.html:
ordre des choses m (uncountable)

  1. order of things, nature of things, nature of the beast; grand scheme of things, grand scheme, big picture
    Synonym: nature des choses
    dans l'ordre des choses ― in the nature of things
    C'est dans l'ordre des choses. ― It's par for the course; it's normal; it's only to be expected.
trans: order of things, nature of things, nature of the beast
grand scheme of things, grand scheme, big picture
order of things, nature of things, nature of the beast
grand scheme of things, grand scheme, big picture
order of things, nature of things, nature of the beast
grand scheme of things, grand scheme, big picture

title: ordre des choses
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɔʁ.dʁə de ʃoz/
